item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 19, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Have you ever seen soldering this close? [video] (498 points | 87 comments)

3. Is Tor still safe to use? (576 points | 371 comments)

9. Aliens and the Enlightenment (22 points | 12 comments)

22. Apple mobile processors are now made in America by TSMC (1560 points | 796 comments)
23. A overview of binaries, ELF, and NoMMU on Linux (112 points | 4 comments)
24. iOS 18 breaks IMAPS self-signed certs (104 points | 115 comments)
25. OpenTelemetry and vendor neutrality: how to build an observability strategy (98 points | 21 comments)
26. Nirvana fallacy (Perfect solution fallacy) (5 points | discuss)
27. LinkedIn is now using everyone's content to train their AI tool (362 points | 195 comments)
28. The Dune Shell (212 points | 66 comments)
29. Text makeup – a tool to decode and explore Unicode strings (71 points | 6 comments)
30. Meticulous (YC S21) is hiring to eliminate UI tests ( | hide)
